name: SiziClockify
0:
”Alexa, open sizi clockify”
”Alexa, start sizi clockify”
”Alexa, launch sizi clockify”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sizi clockify
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sizi Clockify allows you to track time by voice, from anywhere, using Alexa. You can start and stop Clockify time tracker by voice commands.

Clockify, from COING Inc, is a great time tracking app. It offers a free and paid version.

Example commands after you said, Alexa, open sizi clockify:
Start timer - starts Clockify timer with no associated project
Start timer for <name> project - starts Clockify timer with <name> project, assuming you have such a project already set up in Clockify
Stop timer - stops timer
Is my timer running - tells you if you have a timer currently running

Example one step commands:
Alexa, tell sizi clockify to start timer
Alexa, tell sizi clockify to start timer for <name> project
Alexa, ask sizi clockify to stop timer
Alexa, ask sizi clockify if I have a running timer
Alexa, help me with sizi clockify

You don’t always need to use the Clockify app or website to benefit from time tracking. It saves you time, and helps you develop great productivity habits.
